title: What happens if you get a lot of up votes?
body: is there some reward or recognition for this accomplishment? One time I made a post about nerfing Yasuo, it got like 15 upvotes instantly, then a while later it went to -5 cuz the Yasuo mains in diamond with 20 accounts all down voted it to try to keep the idea out of the public eye.

replies.body: Upvotes pretty much mean nothing. And there are no "diamond with 20 accounts" trying to suppress you. They could care less, boards suggestions and input goes nowhere 95% of the time.
Its mostly just children on here thats why they use reddit. If you havent noticed almost everything but shit posts are spam downvoted .
oh. the adults use reddit ur saying?
